data.title: Albert King – Born Under A Bad Sign – on Stax Records

data.text:
Recommended Recordings

As one of Our Recommendations and Recommended Recordings, we recommend Born Under A Bad Sign, by Albert King, on Stax Records.

This is one of the classic 1960’s blues albums. Tracks such as Born Under A Bad Sign, Oh Pretty Woman and The Hunter have been covered by many other musicians, including Free and Jimi Hendrix. Also see our Some Historic Blues Recordings & Covers pages.

Available through Amazon.com and these Amazon affiliates:

Amazon.ca | CD edition | mp3 Download | Vinyl LP |

Amazon.com | CD edition | mp3 Download | Vinyl LP |

The Mississippi Blues Trail marker for Albert King is in Indianola, Mississippi
